CreateChannel.name: CreateChannel
CreateChannel.description: Grants permission to create a channel in a channel group

CreateChannelGroup.name: CreateChannelGroup
CreateChannelGroup.description: Grants permission to create a channel group

CreateOriginEndpoint.name: CreateOriginEndpoint
CreateOriginEndpoint.description: Grants permission to create an origin endpoint for a channel

DeleteChannel.name: DeleteChannel
DeleteChannel.description: Grants permission to delete a channel in a channel group

DeleteChannelGroup.name: DeleteChannelGroup
DeleteChannelGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a channel group

DeleteChannelPolicy.name: DeleteChannelPolicy
DeleteChannelPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a resource policy from a channel

DeleteOriginEndpoint.name: DeleteOriginEndpoint
DeleteOriginEndpoint.description: Grants permission to delete an origin endpoint of a channel

DeleteOriginEndpointPolicy.name: DeleteOriginEndpointPolicy
DeleteOriginEndpointPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a resource policy from an origin endpoint

GetChannel.name: GetChannel
GetChannel.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a channel in a channel group

GetChannelGroup.name: GetChannelGroup
GetChannelGroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a channel group

GetChannelPolicy.name: GetChannelPolicy
GetChannelPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve a resource policy for a channel

GetHeadObject.name: GetHeadObject
GetHeadObject.description: Grants permission to make GetHeadObject requests to MediaPackage

GetObject.name: GetObject
GetObject.description: Grants permission to make GetObject requests to MediaPackage

GetOriginEndpoint.name: GetOriginEndpoint
GetOriginEndpoint.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of an origin endpoint

GetOriginEndpointPolicy.name: GetOriginEndpointPolicy
GetOriginEndpointPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a resource policy for an origin endpoint

ListChannelGroups.name: ListChannelGroups
ListChannelGroups.description: Grants permission to list all channel groups for an aws account

ListChannels.name: ListChannels
ListChannels.description: Grants permission to list all channels in a channel group

ListOriginEndpoints.name: ListOriginEndpoints
ListOriginEndpoints.description: Grants permission to list all origin endpoints of a channel

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for the specified resource

PutChannelPolicy.name: PutChannelPolicy
PutChannelPolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a resource policy for a channel

PutObject.name: PutObject
PutObject.description: Grants permission to make PutObject requests to MediaPackage

PutOriginEndpointPolicy.name: PutOriginEndpointPolicy
PutOriginEndpointPolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a resource policy to an origin endpoint

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add specified tags to the specified resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from the specified resource

UpdateChannel.name: UpdateChannel
UpdateChannel.description: Grants permission to update a channel in a channel group

UpdateChannelGroup.name: UpdateChannelGroup
UpdateChannelGroup.description: Grants permission to update a channel group

UpdateOriginEndpoint.name: UpdateOriginEndpoint
UpdateOriginEndpoint.description: Grants permission to update an origin endpoint of a channel
